EmailTemplate.name: Product-Nurture1-new!.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Ways to Milk Your VMTurbo Trial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We Gave You the Cow, Now Milk It. Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
VMTurbo's Evaluation Resource Center <http://bit.ly/Mdfu0g> guides you through the process of Discover-Converge-Control-Plan, so you can fully leverage your VMTurbo Operations Manager trial for the next 30 glorious days. We gave you the cow. Now we're going to help you milk it. Some Words of Wisdom from the farm:
- Bookmark the Evaluation Resource Center <http://bit.ly/Mdfu0g>. - Watch this disarmingly cute yet informative video <http://bit.ly/1bMIQPP> on our Economic Scheduling Engine (ESE), the abstraction model that recasts the resources of your environment as a free market of buyers and sellers, trading scarce goods and constantly driving the system to dynamic equilibrium. - Schedule a free assessment <http://bit.ly/1gzh9Hf> with one of our experienced dairy farmers, who can answer questions and provide you with real-time milking tips (it's an extended metaphor, where your VMTurbo trial is the cow and the milk is increased utilization, VM density, and application performance.)
Give a man a cow, and there's no telling how he'll use it. Teach a man to milk, and his virtual environment will live in a state of perpetual health. Yup. We just brought the metaphor full-circle. Questions, comments, or feedback? Moo <sales@vmturbo.com>. Closing the loop, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
contact us <http://go.vmturbo.com/contact-us.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | website <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | privacy policy <http://www.vmturbo.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker>
